src:
Cedera, Luis Suarez Menepi Hingga Akhir November
04 Nov 2019, 20:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah kabar buruk datang bagi Barcelona. Penyerang mereka, Luis Suarez harus menepi cukup lama akibat cedera yang ia dapatkan.
Cedera Suarez itu didapatkan saat pertandingan melawan Levante di akhir pekan kemarin. Pada laga itu, striker asal Uruguay itu harus ditarik pada menit 41 setelah ia mengeluh kesakitan di kakinya.
Setelah melaksanakan pemeriksaan medis, Pihak Barcelona mengumumkan bahwa sang striker mengalami cedera di bagian betis. Pada keterangan resmi mereka, pihak Barcelona tidak membeberkan berapa lama Suarez akan absen.
London Evening Standard mengklaim bahwa cedera Suarez tergolong tidak terlalu parah. Namun ia butuh waktu yang tidak sedikit untuk memulihkan cederanya.

Simak kondisi cedera Suarez selengkapnya di bawah ini.
text:
Injury, Luis Suarez pulled over until late November
Nov 04 2019, 20:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A bad news comes for Barcelona. Their attacker, Luis Suarez had to be pulled aside for a long time due to the injury he got.
Suarez injury was obtained during the match against Levante at the weekend. In that match, the Uruguayan striker had to be withdrawn in the 41st minute after he complained of pain in his leg.
After carrying out a medical examination, Barcelona announced that the striker suffered an injury in the calf. In their official statement, the Barcelona did not reveal how long Suarez will be absent.
The London Evening Standard claims that Suarez's injury is not too severe. But he needed a lot of time to recover the injury.

Check out Suarez's injury conditions in full below.
